question: Nowadays many people have access to computers on a wide basis and a large number of children play computer games.What are the advantages and disadvantages of playing games on computers by childrens .
text: In the technical era , the computers are increasing rapidly rather than in the past , which is most used by children for playing games on it , therefore this essay illustrates the disadvantage more than the advantage.

The first and foremost reason is that it impacts on their study, which comes in between accomplishing their goals , due to the spend flooded times on devices , for instance , a survey indicated that last year 20% of adults had become addicted to games, consequently , which will affect their career in the future.

Moreover , if they will play the whole day on the PC , they will get infected to the eye , due to itself and that is the reason they have to wear spectacles , for example , nowadays , numerous people wear glasses , due to the advanced technology , as a result , if people take it lightly , it will affect more body parts. Furthermore , most of them are not eligible for a job so it affects the family budget, consequently , they have to work as  labour.

On the other hand  , some students are not too good at  education but they have amazing game skills that they try their luck in the e-sports , such as , currently, thousands of children play games on computers and earn bucks rather than our thoughts , which gives them internal satisfaction. Secondly , they learn something new from there ; like , a number of social media platforms provide great information , which can help them in Academic as well as social, consequently , they give honest people to the nation.

In conclusion  , children should be understood for their career to avoid this type of worse time pass game, which totally negative impact on them , therefore they must give first priority to the study.
